name: The endless highway of WTF
description:
This is my first released game, i had a lot of projects in the learning process but I'm confident enough to publish this game, thank you in advance for you'r interest in my game.

It all started as a joke between me and a friend of mine talking about the world and well i don't know how but, the idea was born out of that conversion .

The endless highway of W.T.F. is an endless runner type of game with funny cartoon graphics and fill , i implemented my way to show how people have to be vigilant about what they  put inside there brain, i hope you enjoy it and have fun.

Android version will be soon available but most probably with a price tag of  0.99 euros (that's the max price if there will be any ), once i don't want to make the game with ads as the game was never build for ads.
